dcterms:creator: S. V. Albrecht
S. Ramamoorthy
dcterms:description: A cooperative environment where agents must reach and jointly stay in specific grid cells to receive rewards, requiring collaboration strategies to select destinations.
dcterms:title: Cooperative Reaching

dcterms:creator: S. V. Albrecht
J. W. Crandall
S. Ramamoorthy
dcterms:description: A foraging environment where agents must collect scattered objects while adhering to level requirements, necessitating collaboration to achieve successful collections.
dcterms:title: Level-Based Foraging (LBF)

dcterms:creator: S. Barrett
A. Rosenfeld
S. Kraus
P. Stone
dcterms:description: A cooking environment where two chefs must collaborate to prepare a dish by processing ingredients and delivering the final product, requiring effective task division.
dcterms:title: Simple Cooking
